name: Cold Dilled Peas
keywords: dill, peas, sour cream, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup chopped fresh dill, chives or a combination of both
Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Boil peas in salted water until very tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Drain and immediately plunge peas into ice water until cool. Drain again.
Mix the remaining ingredients with the peas and refrigerate for one hour before serving.
